name: Toasted Squash Green Beans
description: This Toasted Squash Green Beans recipe is a perfect blend of health and flavor. Packed with high-fiber ingredients, it's part of our Healthyfied collection that transforms traditional recipes into healthier versions. Ideal for anyone looking to add nutritious yet delicious dishes to their diet.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and cut the Kabocha squash into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the ends off the Baguio beans and cut them in half if they are too long.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the red bell peppers and eggplant into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix the prepared squash, beans, bell peppers, eggplant, salt, and black pepper. Squeeze the lemon over the mixture and toss until everything is evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for 25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned, stirring halfway through the cooking time.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
